Objectives: Cultivate rice from seed to grain entirely in orbit including ratoon rice (second harvest)
Expected_Outcomes: Space-grown rice germplasm with higher yields and stress tolerance for Earth agriculture

Objectives: Induce human embryonic stem cells to differentiate into blood-making stem cells in microgravity
Expected_Outcomes: First-ever blood cell precursor generation in space; regenerative medicine applications

Objectives: Identify and analyze microbial species on station surfaces
Expected_Outcomes: Discovery of radiation-resistant bacterium; insights for planetary protection

Objectives: Solidify niobium-titanium alloys via electromagnetic levitation without container contact
Expected_Outcomes: Defect-free crystals for aerospace and hypersonic applications

Objectives: Maintain 4 zebrafish + plants in closed aquarium for 43 days; longest vertebrate aquatic habitat
Expected_Outcomes: Bioregenerative life support validation; vestibular/neural development insights

Objectives: Study cellular self-degradation (autophagy) in skeletal muscle cells under microgravity
Expected_Outcomes: Countermeasures (drugs/exercise) to protect astronaut muscle health

Objectives: Grow defect-free gallium arsenide and indium phosphide single crystals via gradient freeze
Expected_Outcomes: Nearly perfect crystals for high-performance microelectronics and optoelectronics

Objectives: Convert CO2 + H2O into O2 and ethylene using semiconductor photocatalysts and solar light
Expected_Outcomes: First in-orbit O2 and fuel production from CO2; closed-loop life support for Moon/Mars

Objectives: Study 4 mice (2M/2F) for microgravity effects on physiology reproduction and behavior
Expected_Outcomes: First mammalian microgravity study by China; analogs for human health

Objectives: 2m aperture co-orbiting telescope; survey 40% of sky over 10 years; 2.5 gigapixel camera
Expected_Outcomes: Dark matter mapping; galaxy formation studies; exoplanet detection via microlensing

Objectives: 3D organoids of healthy and cancerous intestinal tissue to test microgravity effects on tumor growth
Expected_Outcomes: New cancer therapies by understanding microgravity tumor suppression

Objectives: Gamma-ray burst polarimetry to study nature of GRBs and gravitational wave transients
Expected_Outcomes: Answer fundamental questions about GRB origins and connection to gravitational waves

Objectives: 4-ton particle detector for dark matter and cosmic rays with 10x sensitivity of AMS-02
Expected_Outcomes: Dark matter detection; cosmic ray spectrum mapping; cost $155-310M

Objectives: Mount spectrograph on CSS to observe nebular gas spectroscopically
Expected_Outcomes: Nebular composition and dynamics data for stellar evolution models

Objectives: Study fluids that mix only partially (maleic acid urea) under microgravity
Expected_Outcomes: Fundamental fluid dynamics for industrial applications

Objectives: Microgravity fluid physics and combustion experiments
Expected_Outcomes: Fire safety and fluid behavior for spacecraft design

Objectives: Biotechnology and life science experiments for Mars mission preparation
Expected_Outcomes: Life support and biological adaptation data for Mars exploration

Objectives: Mid-infrared platform for Earth observations; nano-satellite payload development
Expected_Outcomes: Experience for MIR solar space telescope in 3U CubeSat

Objectives: Develop and test multi-junction gallium arsenide solar cells for space applications
Expected_Outcomes: Higher-efficiency solar cells for spacecraft power systems

Objectives: Mix lunar regolith simulant in microgravity to test radiation shielding and oxygen extraction
Expected_Outcomes: In-situ resource utilization for lunar base construction

Objectives: Test new lunar extravehicular activity suit in microgravity environment
Expected_Outcomes: Validation for crewed lunar landing program before 2030

Objectives: Launch multi-functional hub module with 6 docking ports + 2 additional lab modules
Expected_Outcomes: Double station size to ~180 tons; increase crew to 6; expand research capacity

Objectives: Long-duration centrifuge experiments for partial gravity health effects
Expected_Outcomes: Countermeasures for bone/muscle loss; lunar/Mars gravity analog data

Objectives: Print complex tissues and organ structures in microgravity
Expected_Outcomes: Space-manufactured organs and tissues for regenerative medicine

Objectives: Test bioregenerative systems with algae recycling CO2/waste into O2 and food
Expected_Outcomes: Self-sustaining life support for lunar base and Mars missions

Objectives: Ultra-precise timekeeping (hydrogen rubidium optical clocks) to test relativity and measure gravitational redshift
Expected_Outcomes: GPS/GNSS accuracy improvements; fundamental physics tests

Objectives: Short-duration mission (~10 days) with Pakistani payload specialist conducting experiments for Pakistan
Expected_Outcomes: First international astronaut on Tiangong; bilateral cooperation demonstration

Objectives: One taikonaut remains aboard for over 1 year (longest Chinese spaceflight)
Expected_Outcomes: Long-duration health data for lunar/Mars mission planning

Objectives: Grow and harvest chile peppers in Advanced Plant Habitat; record crop feeding most astronauts
Expected_Outcomes: Fresh food production validation for deep-space missions; vitamin C source

Objectives: Activate new Russian lab module with research racks life support and European Robotic Arm
Expected_Outcomes: Expanded Russian research capacity; additional lab space and airlock

Objectives: Create ultra-cold atoms (near absolute zero) for quantum research in Cold Atom Lab
Expected_Outcomes: BECs sustained 10+ seconds; quantum phenomena studies impossible on Earth

Objectives: Organ-on-chip models (kidney lung brain) for aging drug testing and disease modeling
Expected_Outcomes: Kidney stone compound discovery (in trials); aging/inflammation pathway identification

Objectives: 3D-bioprint human meniscus cartilage using live cells without Earth-gravity collapse
Expected_Outcomes: First human cartilage printed in space; validated avascular tissue printing

Objectives: Observe millisecond pulsars with unprecedented precision to refine neutron star models
Expected_Outcomes: Gravitational wave background data; 6 pulsar rotation measurements updated

Objectives: High-speed cameras and photometers observing lightning leaders blue jets and elves
Expected_Outcomes: First detailed thundercloud lightning development maps; climate model improvements

Objectives: Study skin wound healing in mice under microgravity; collagen deposition changes
Expected_Outcomes: Tissue regeneration insights for astronaut injury treatment

Objectives: Test perovskite photovoltaic cells on ISS exterior for 10 months of radiation/thermal cycling
Expected_Outcomes: >95% efficiency retention; validated for space applications

Objectives: Print thick cardiac muscle construct and culture for weeks maintaining contractile function
Expected_Outcomes: First functional human heart tissue in space; path to transplantable organs

Objectives: Print and perfuse liver tissue with embedded vascular channels
Expected_Outcomes: Advanced vascularized tissue printing; organogenesis progress

Objectives: Ground surgeons remotely operate MIRA surgical robot aboard ISS with ~1-second lag
Expected_Outcomes: Telerobotic surgery validated for space; Earth rural medicine applications

Objectives: Grow monoclonal antibody crystals for cancer immunotherapy formulation improvement
Expected_Outcomes: New Keytruda formulation allowing injection instead of IV infusion

Objectives: Grow microcrystals achieving 98% perfect crystalline phase for improved drug stability
Expected_Outcomes: More stable diabetes medication formulation

Objectives: Pull >11 km ZBLAN fiber including single >1km continuous fiber with 10x lower loss than silica
Expected_Outcomes: Superior fiber for telecommunications and quantum computing networks; commercial satellite factory planned

Objectives: Test lower-body pressure device to reverse headward fluid shift and mitigate vision impairment
Expected_Outcomes: Countermeasure validated for Spaceflight Associated Neuro-ocular Syndrome

Objectives: Culture human endothelial cells to identify microgravity-altered molecular pathways
Expected_Outcomes: 24 pathways related to inflammation and aging identified; osteoporosis/senescence treatment targets

Objectives: 14 student experiments from 13 Asia-Pacific countries (oobleck origami etc.)
Expected_Outcomes: STEM engagement across Asia-Pacific; next-gen scientist inspiration

Objectives: First-ever experiments from Hungary Uganda Ethiopia; commercial private missions
Expected_Outcomes: Global access expansion; STEM inspiration in underserved nations

Objectives: Latest plant growth experiments with seed pillows testing scalable crop systems
Expected_Outcomes: Aeroponic and hydroponic system validation; >50 species grown to date

Objectives: Grow induced pluripotent stem cells at large scale in bioreactors for regenerative therapies
Expected_Outcomes: Space-manufactured stem cells for Earth medical applications

Objectives: Engineer microbes to produce vitamins and supplements on-demand for Mars missions
Expected_Outcomes: Self-sufficient nutrition for deep-space missions without resupply

Objectives: Test interplanetary internet protocols with communication delays
Expected_Outcomes: Mars mission communication infrastructure; DTN validation

Objectives: Test space-to-Earth quantum entangled photon communication
Expected_Outcomes: Secure quantum networks; satellite-based quantum internet

Objectives: $3.1M NASA award funding 3 additional projects using human brain organoid 3D replicas
Expected_Outcomes: Brain cell behavior in microgravity; neurological disease insights

Objectives: Study bone-forming stem cells in microgravity to understand astronaut bone loss mechanisms
Expected_Outcomes: Countermeasures for bone loss; osteoporosis treatment insights

Objectives: Bioprint implantable medical devices and test on ground in preclinical studies
Expected_Outcomes: High-quality implants manufactured in space for Earth patients; organ shortage solutions

Objectives: Integrated ECLSS demonstration achieving >98% air and water recycling
Expected_Outcomes: Mars transit-ready life support system; minimal resupply dependence

Objectives: Test new lunar EVA spacesuit life support backpack via vacuum exposure
Expected_Outcomes: Validation for Artemis Moon missions

Objectives: Test Gateway refueling system and other lunar station elements
Expected_Outcomes: Risk reduction for Gateway assembly and operations

Objectives: Confine crew subset to Russian segment for 240 days simulating Mars ship with communication delays
Expected_Outcomes: Autonomous operations validation; psychological data for Mars transit

Experiment_Name: CRISPR Gene Therapy for Muscle Atrophy
Objectives: Administer gene therapy vectors or CRISPR gene editing to mice to counter muscle atrophy
Expected_Outcomes: Cutting-edge medical intervention; gene editing in space for bone/muscle stimulation

Objectives: Attach Axiom Payload Power Thermal Module (PPTM) then Habitat One module
Expected_Outcomes: Commercial station transition; private research platform

Objectives: Fixed spectrometer to study plant fluorescence from orbit
Expected_Outcomes: Vegetation health monitoring; climate and agriculture insights

Objectives: Upgraded cargo craft delivering new experiments and supplies through 2030
Expected_Outcomes: Continued Japanese research contributions; enhanced cargo capacity

Objectives: Potential decommissioning after >175 billion cosmic ray particles collected
Expected_Outcomes: Dark matter search data; cosmic ray spectrum; potential transfer to Tiangong or satellite

Objectives: 12 winning teams from African nations conducting nanoparticle synthesis and crystal growth
Expected_Outcomes: STEM engagement across Africa; first experiments for many nations

Objectives: External commercial platform attached to Columbus for paying customer experiments
Expected_Outcomes: Revenue generation; commercial access expansion

Objectives: US Deorbit Vehicle (USDV) docks and lowers orbit for controlled Pacific re-entry Jan 2031
Expected_Outcomes: Safe station disposal; prevent uncontrolled reentry
